post.author: Admin
post.title: Market Day orders are due by this Saturday
post.description: Hi Band Boosters, Market Day orders are due by this Saturday, October 4, 2014 at 11:00 pm at www.ma
post.content:
Hi Band Boosters,

Market Day orders are due by this Saturday, October 4, 2014 at 11:00 pm at www.marketday.com. Pick up is Thursday, October 9, 2014 from 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm. Please note the time change for pick up!

If you spend at least $90 this month and enter the promo code OCTBONUS during checkout you will receive a free 1 lb. bag of Chicken Gems.

Also, if you have never ordered from Market Day before, and you place an on-line order of $50 or more, you can save $5 by entering the promo code FALLFIVE during check out.

FYI....You can enter multiply promo codes on the same order.

Any questions, please contact Sue Galuska at suegaluska@yahoo.com or 440-582-4120.

Thanks,
Sue Galuska
